sense.def:
The top of something
je najvišja točka, del ali ploskev nečesa.

seg.quote: He filled his glass to the top.

sense.def:
Stvar, ki je v nekem nizu
top
, je najvišja.

The top of a street
je en konec ulice.

seg.quote: ...a new building at the top of Victoria Street.

sense.def:
The top of an organization or scale of measurement
je najvišji del organizacije ali najvišja točka merske lestvice.

seg.quote: Officials at the top make the decisions.
The vehicle's top speed is about 100.

sense.def:
The top of a bottle, jar, or tube
je tisto, kar pokriva steklenico, kozarec ali tubo.

seg.quote: He unscrewed the top and put the bottle to his mouth.

sense.def:
A top
je oblačilo, ki ga ženske nosijo na gornjem delu telesa.

A top
je tudi igrača v obliki stožca, ki se lahko vrti na konici.

To top a poll or popularity chart
pomeni doseči boljšo uvrstitev v anketi ali na lestvici priljubljenosti kot vsi drugi.

Kadar nekaj
tops a particular amount
, postane večje od določene količine.

seg.quote: US investments topped fifty million dollars.

sense.def:
Kar je
on top of something else
, je na najvišji točki tistega.

seg.quote: ...a tower with a little flag on top.

sense.def:
On top of other things
pomeni poleg drugih stvari, ki so navedene.

seg.quote: You don't want to give the poor man ulcers on top of all the problems he's already got.

sense.def:
To be on top of a task
pomeni uspešno opravljati določeno nalogo.

Kadar nekaj
gets on top of someone
, človeka zelo potre, ker ne obvlada položaja.

seg.quote: You may find the housework is getting on top of you.

sense.def:
Kar je
over the top
, ni sprejemljivo, ker je preveč skrajno.

To top up a container
pomeni znova napolniti posodo, ki je delno izpraznjena.

seg.quote: The radiator will have to be topped up because of evaporation.
